Sentencas: The performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells were assessed.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The phase composition of samples before and after reduction was characterized by X-ray diffractornetry.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical properties of samples were measured using impedance spectroscopy in air and hydrogen atmospheres.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficients (TECs) of samples before and after reduction were measured using a dilatometer.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical characteristics of cell with designed anodic materials were analyzed to evaluate the feasibility for anodic application.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results show that no significant reaction between NiO and LSGM is detected for samples sintered at 1000 degrees C for 10 h, but when the samples were sintered at 1050 degrees C for 10 h, the impurity phase LaNiO3 was detected.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: For samples after reduction, the impurity phase content tends to increase with increasing Ni content.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Adding of Cu can effectively reduce the reaction between Ni and LSGM.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electronic conduction characteristics have been displayed for NiO-CuO-LSGM after reduction.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The TECs of Ni-Cu-LSGM are compatible with LSGM electrolyte.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, lacking of electrocatalytic activity of Cu leads to higher anode overpotentials and smaller exchange current density.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The Ni-Cu-LSGM is not thought to be a suitable anode material for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3 -based solid oxide fuel cells operating below 800 degrees
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells
Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The catalytic activity of this anodic material may be further improved through adding appropriate amount Of Sm2O3-doped CeO2 to Ni-Cu-LSGM.
Titulo: Assessment of performances of Ni-Cu-LSGM as anode materials for intermediate-temperature LaGaO3-based solid oxide fuel cells
